response.original_title: CDTVライブライブ大感謝祭2024
response.overview: TBS's long-running music program "CDTV" has been broadcast live every Monday night on the TBS network since spring 2020 as "CDTV Live! Live!"  This time, a special event will be held to express gratitude to the viewers who always support the program! The event was hosted by Eto-chan (TBS announcer Ai Eto) and voice actor Hiro Shimono.  On the first day, the 14th, Da-iCE, NiziU, FANTASTICS, FRUITS ZIPPER, on the second day, the 15th, imase, &TEAM, Bullet Train, Little Glee Monster, and on the final day, the 16th, WEST., Kawasaki Takaya, JO1, TOMORROW X TOGETHER, FUNKY MONKEY BΛBY'S appeared, and a total of 13 super luxurious artists gathered at Tokyo Garden Theater for three days! In addition to performing songs that fans wanted to hear in a ranking format, the venue was greatly excited by special editions of the program's popular projects.
response.title: CDTV Live! Live! THANKS FES 2024
